amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure none of the funds made available by this Act may be used to issue grazing permits or leases in contravention of BLM regulations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 51 printed in House Report 115-830 to ensure none of the funds made available by this Act may be used to issue grazing permits or leases in contravention of BLM regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A047) Failed by recorded vote: 203 - 212 (Roll no. 352).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A047) offered by Mr. Gallego.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gallego amendment (A047) Failed by recorded vote: 203 - 212 (Roll no. 352).
